item.title: Aptevo Therapeutics Stock Slumps To All-Time Low On Reverse Split Approval
item.description: The move will cut Aptevo’s issued and outstanding shares from about 18 million to roughly a million.

item.title: Why Did ECDA Shares Double In Value Today?
item.description: ECD Auto Design announced an expanded 2026 product lineup, including new heritage programs and modern platforms, and also upgraded its safety innovati...

item.title: Why Is PowerBank Stock Drawing Investor Attention Today?
item.description: The company announced that the DeStarlink Genesis-1 satellite, launched on December 10, is now operational, generating solar power.

item.title: Why Is Jeffs’ Brands Stock Rising Today?
item.description: Jeffs’ Brands trimmed its stake in Fort Technology, marking another step toward shifting its focus from e-commerce to the homeland security sector.

item.title: Sidus Space Stock Is Up 218% This Month — Why Are Retail Investors Still Bullish?
item.description: Sidus Space shares are rallying after the company gained a major defense contract and announced a public offering of 19 million shares this month.
